Post.title: Hello World
Post._content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

```bash
hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

```bash
hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

```bash
hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

```bash
hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)

Post.title: GitHub Pages + Hexo
Post._content:
# 

 [GitHub Pages](https://pages.github.com/)  Blog  Blog  [GitHub](https://github.com/) + [Hexo](https://hexo.io/zh-tw/)  Blog 

# Hexo

## 

 Hexo 

- [Node.js](http://nodejs.org/)
- [Git](http://git-scm.com/)

##  Hexo

 Node.js  Git  npm  Hexo 

```bash
npm install -g hexo-cli
```

##  Blog

Hexo [](https://hexo.io/zh-tw/docs/setup)Hexo 

```bash
hexo init Blog
cd Blog
npm install
```

 [Hello World](/Hexo/20220818/1243066710/)  Blog  <font color="red">\_config.yml</font> 

## 

[](https://hexo.io/zh-tw/docs/configuration) title()description()keywords()language()author()theme() deploy()

## (Theme)

[](https://hexo.io/themes/) [NexT](https://theme-next.js.org/) NexT [](https://theme-next.js.org/docs/getting-started/)

##  GitHub Pages  Hexo

[](https://hexo.io/zh-tw/docs/github-pages) GitHub  username.github.io (Repository) Settings > Pages > Source branch  gh-pages [](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment) <font color="red">\_config.yml</font>

 Blog  Hexo (Branch)

| (Branch) |           |
| :----------- | :---------------- |
| master       |  Hexo         |
| gh-pages     | GitHub Pages  |

###  [hexo-deployer-git](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo-deployer-git)

```bash
npm install hexo-deployer-git --save
```

###  \_config.yml

 deploy 

```bash
deploy:
  type: git
  repo: https://github.com/<username>/<project>
  # example, https://github.com/hexojs/hexojs.github.io
  branch: gh-pages
```

##  Hexo

 Hexo Blog 

### 

```bash
git init # 
git remote add origin https://github.com/<username>/<username>.github.io.git #  Github 
```

 Hexo  .git  Github  /.git/config  Github  GitHub 

```bash
git add . # /
git commit -m "" #  commit 
git push -u origin master #  Github 
```

### 

(depoly.ps1)

```powershell
cd {absolute_path}
git add .
git commit --amend --no-edit
git push -f
hexo cl #  public 
hexo d -g #  public 
```



```powershell
powershell -file depoly.ps1
```
Post.raw:

Post.title: Windows ENG ()
Post._content:
Windows[ Windows PowerShell ](https://blog.miniasp.com/post/2020/03/19/Devs-must-setup-multi-language-input-method)(~ ~)Google

```powershell
$UserLanguageList = New-WinUserLanguageList -Language "zh-TW"
$UserLanguageList.Add("en-US")
Set-WinUserLanguageList -LanguageList $UserLanguageList -Force
Set-WinDefaultInputMethodOverride -InputTip "0409:00000409" # ENG () 
```

Windows[ Windows PowerShell ](https://blog.miniasp.com/post/2020/03/19/Devs-must-setup-multi-language-input-method)(~ ~)Google

```powershell
$UserLanguageList = New-WinUserLanguageList -Language "zh-TW"
$UserLanguageList.Add("en-US")
Set-WinUserLanguageList -LanguageList $UserLanguageList -Force
Set-WinDefaultInputMethodOverride -InputTip "0409:00000409" # ENG () 
```
